emergency.title: EMERGENCY
emergency.subtitle: Quick access to critical procedures
emergency.noChecklistsText: Add an emergency checklist to have quick access to critical procedures.
emergency.infoItems:
• Life-threatening situations
• Equipment failure
• Man overboard
• Fire or flooding
• Medical emergencies
• Any situation requiring immediate action

checkWeather.title: Check weather forecast
checkWeather.description: Review local weather conditions and marine forecast

inspectLifeJackets.title: Inspect life jackets
inspectLifeJackets.description: Ensure all crew members have properly fitting life jackets

checkFuel.title: Check fuel level
checkFuel.description: Verify sufficient fuel for planned route

testLights.title: Test navigation lights
testLights.description: Ensure all navigation lights are functioning

assessSituation.title: Assess the situation
assessSituation.description: Determine the nature and severity of the emergency

alertCrew.title: Alert crew and passengers
alertCrew.description: Inform all persons on board of the emergency

lifeJackets.title: Put on life jackets
lifeJackets.description: Ensure everyone dons their life jackets immediately

distressCall.title: Make distress call
distressCall.description: Send MAYDAY on VHF Channel 16 if life-threatening

deploySafety.title: Deploy safety equipment
deploySafety.description: Prepare life raft, flares, and emergency beacon (EPIRB)

controlSituation.title: Attempt to control situation
controlSituation.description: Take immediate action to contain/resolve the emergency

prepareEvacuation.title: Prepare for evacuation
prepareEvacuation.description: If necessary, prepare to abandon ship

arrival.name: Arrival Procedures
arrival.description: Essential tasks to complete upon arrival at destination.

secureBoat.title: Secure the boat at the dock or anchorage
secureBoat.description: Properly moor the vessel with appropriate lines and fenders

engineShutdown.title: Engine shutdown and post-operation checks
engineShutdown.description: Turn off engine and perform post-operation inspection

checkLines.title: Check all lines and fenders
checkLines.description: Verify all mooring lines and fenders are properly secured and positioned

logArrival.title: Log arrival time and location
logArrival.description: Record arrival time, location, and relevant navigation notes

checkCrew.title: Check crew and passengers
checkCrew.description: Ensure all crew and passengers are safely disembarked or accounted for
